text: nang klaw wa kha tæ phracea khxng kha phraxngkh kha phraxngkh ca mi butr di xyangri thang «thi midi mi burusʹ dı tæatxng kha phraxngkh phraxngkh tras wa kranan ktam xallxhˌ ca thrng bangkeid sing thi phraxngkh thrng prasngkh meux phraxngkh thrng chikhad ngan dı læw phraxngkh k pheiyng prakasit kæ sing nan wa cng pen khun theid læw man k ca pen khun
